title: Jilted boyfriend flushed ex-lover's hamster down toilet
text: Share Fraser pleaded guilty and told the court he wanted to 'get on with his life'. After the case, a spokesman for the RSPCA said the public wanted to see tougher sentences for animal cruelty. The spokesman said: 'This is a really upsetting case and the poor hamster would've been caused immense distress and suffering. 'Recent RSPCA polling shows that 70% of people would like to see the Government bring in tougher sentences for the most serious cases of animal cruelty and neglect.' SHOCKING FOOTAGE OF MAN FLUSHING PET DOWN THE TOILET Earlier this year shocking footage emerged of another man flushing his ex-partner's hamster down the toilet. Posted on Twitter by user @ClutchLikeRomo the clip shows a man reaching into a hamster's cage and grabbing the helpless animal. He immediately throws it into the toilet and presses the flush. A shocking video emerged last month of another man flushing his ex-partner's hamster down the toilet, pictured Along with the video the man tweeted: 'My ex gave me a pet hamster for Christmas and cheated on me F*** YOU AND YOUR HAMSTER LISA YOU W**RE.' The horrible video has been met by hundreds of replies on the social media site. People have been horrified by the apparent act of cruelty and others have argued over whether or not hamsters can swim. It is not clear where the video was filmed but it has been shared lots of times.
